title: Ãœbel Blatt
genres: Animation, Action & Adventure, Drama, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
overview: Fourteen warriors set out to prevent an invasion, but only seven return. Three died along the way, and four were slain for betraying the empire. In truth, it is the Seven Heroes who turned on their allies so they could take all the glory. Ascheriit was their victim, but now, 20 years later, he is back to get revenge.
